item.title: Reproducible R docs and GitHub
item.description: Steph Locke - We are over the moon to have Steph Locke, a prominent R lady practitioner on the global tech scene, doing an Intermediate-level session on git/github and Rmarkdown for R-Ladies London!! She is based in Cardiff, hence we are privileged to have her in the big smoke for this session. Stephâ€™s...
